      • NextGenerationRunnable

        public NextGenerationRunnable(int start,
                              int stop,
                              int clearStart,
                              int clearStop,
                              java.util.concurrent.CyclicBarrier barrier,
                              Algorithm algorithm)
        Creates a Runnable
        Parameters:
        start - The start position of the board segment
        stop - The end position of the board segment
        clearStart - The position where the thread should start emptying the neighbour array
        clearStop - The position where the thread should stop emptying the neighbour array
        barrier - The cyclic barrier
        algorithm - The Algorithm to use
